div.p: You have control over who can access your studies. To share a study with an individual, you will need to add them as an administrator. Administrators will have all the same rights as you — the study creator — including uploading data, downloading anonymized data, adding/removing administrators and editing the study information. Administrators will only be able to access the study once it has been registered and will need to register with the WWARN website.
You can add or remove administrators at any time by logging into your account, navigating to this study and clicking the Permissions tab.
